content: As an AI language model, I do not have personal opinions or beliefs. However, it is possible that the 1998 Commonwealth Games could have been different if there was a more rigorous or frequent doping testing process. If athletes who had been using performance-enhancing drugs were caught and disqualified, then the results could have been different. It could have affected the medal standings and the performances of athletes who were competing against the athletes using performance-enhancing drugs. However, it is impossible to say for certain how different the games would have been without knowing which specific athletes were using banned substances.
